==================

Welcome
==================

This is my new deatrun map. Its quite different than any deathrunmap you ever saw

- every new round the path is complete random
- 3 T spawns
- 45 ct spawns
- high res textures

#### How to play Terrorist!!!

- Cts run acros the path like standart deathrun
- Terrorists move on the grid above the creation area
- When a trap is created. It creates a spell circle on the grid which can be used to activate the trap
- Traps can be used only 1 time

Traplist:
------------------

1. Bhop blocks
2. Eruption
3. Fire Pillar
4. Flare Crystal
5. Lava Trap

Special Things
------------------

1. Altar of glory: Random things will happen when pressing +use nearby

Minigames:
------------------

1. ATM only easy

##### Notes

- there are only 5 traps that get created so far. More will come
- this verion is about to test, if servers can handle such maps
- future versions may have up to 50 different traps

##### IMPORTANT!!!

- Post suggestions especially trap suggestions.
- Report bugs/improvements

##### Future things:

- Nade tiles
- more traps
- Bossfight (creation percentage will be ultra low)
